    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
        jTextField1.setText(null);
        jTextField2.setText(null);
        jTextField3.setText(null);
        jTextField4.setText(null);
        cntrl = false;
    }

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
        try {
            long firstPrime = Long.parseLong(jTextField1.getText());
            long secondPrime = Long.parseLong(jTextField2.getText());
            long anyNumber = Long.parseLong(jTextField3.getText());
            long base = firstPrime * secondPrime;
            long x0 = ((anyNumber * anyNumber) % base);
            long x2 = ((x0 * x0) % base);
            String rastgalems = String.valueOf(x2);
            jTextField4.setText(rastgalems);

        } catch (Exception e) {
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this, "error");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
